targets.rawSql:
SELECT time AS "time", automated, not_automated, manual_only
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", automated, not_automated, manual_only
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", critical, high, medium, low
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", critical, high, medium, low
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", ui, non_ui
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", ui, non_ui
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", functional, non_functional
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", functional, non_functional
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", negative
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", missing_assignee, missing_automation_status, missing_component, missing_importance, missing_interface_type, missing_requirements, missing_type
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", customer_scenario
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT assignees
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
LIMIT 1

SELECT codecoverage.time AS "time", codecoverage.coverage, repositories.name
FROM codecoverage INNER JOIN repositories ON codecoverage.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT codecoverage.time AS "time", codecoverage.coverage, repositories.name
FROM codecoverage INNER JOIN repositories ON codecoverage.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT cloc.time AS "time", cloc.cloc, repositories.name FROM cloc INNER JOIN repositories ON cloc.repository_id=repositories.id
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT cloc.time AS "time", cloc.cloc, repositories.name FROM cloc INNER JOIN repositories ON cloc.repository_id=repositories.id
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", resolved, unresolved, rejected
FROM jira 
WHERE project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", resolved, unresolved, rejected
FROM jira 
WHERE project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", todo, blocked, in_progress, code_review, on_qa, release_pending
FROM jira 
WHERE project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", todo, blocked, in_progress, code_review, on_qa, release_pending
FROM jira 
WHERE project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", created_last_15d, created_last_30d
FROM jira 
WHERE project_id=$project_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

panels.description: Created jira in last 15 and 30 days.
